note.p: Birth: In or near London, England (c 1666)
Death: Petty-France (now York Street), Westminster, London (02 November 1723)

Career: Gentleman Waiter to Prince George of Denmark; Gentleman of the Privy Chamber to Queen Anne and George I; Secretary to the Commission for Queen Anne's Bounty; Commissioner of the Peace for Middlesex; knew sixteen languages; issued five editions of 'The present state of England' originally published by his father
